mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public.questions (test_id, question_text, question_type, correct_answer, score, question_order) VALUES (#{test_id}, #{question_text}, #{question_type}, #{correct_answer}, #{score}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(question_order), 0) + 1 FROM public.questions WHERE test_id = #{test_id}))
INSERT INTO public.options (question_id, option_number, option_text) VALUES (#{question_id}, #{option_number}, #{option_text});
mapper.select: SELECT id, question_order FROM public.questions WHERE test_id = #{testId} ORDER BY question_order;
mapper.update: update questions set question_text=#{question_text}, question_type=#{question_type}, correct_answer=#{correct_answer}, score=#{score} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.question_text, q.question_type, q.correct_answer, q.score FROM public.questions q WHERE q.test_id = (SELECT test_id FROM public.questions WHERE id = #{id}) AND q.question_order > (SELECT question_order FROM public.questions WHERE id = #{id}) ORDER BY q.question_order LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into answers (user_id, test_id, question_id, answer) values (#{user_id}, #{test_id}, #{question_id}, #{answer})
mapper.update: update answers set answer = #{answer} where user_id=#{user_id} and test_id=#{test_id} and question_id=#{question_id}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_participation(user_id, test_id, start_time, end_time, status) values (#{userId}, #{testId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: select * from exam_participation where user_id=#{userId} and test_id=#{testId}
